title: Kenji’s Lemon Roasted Chicken And Potatoes
directions: - Preheat oven to 475 Fahrenheit convection or 500 Fahrenheit.
- Cut Potatoes in half. And add to pot of boiling water. Cook until knife goes through with little resistance
-Mince Parsley. Add to bowl with 1 lemon squeezed. Crush 4 cloves of garlic to the bowl. Add 1/4 cup of olive oil and mix marinade. Add Salt & Pepper

- take 1/2 of mixture and add to larger bowl. Added garlic powder and dried oregano + 3 tablespoons of oil. Add chicken to bowl. Drain cooked potatoes and add to bowl as well. Toss ingredients in bowl until marinade is fully incorporated and potatoes are starchy.
- Pour Ingredients in bowl to a parchment lined sheet tray. Cut lemon and put both halves cut side up. Bake for 45 minutes. Flip potatoes. Cook for 10-15 more minutes.
- Take out of oven. Squeeze cooked lemons over tray. Remove and add to bowl. Mix reserved marinade.
